required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Study of M2ES With Paclitaxel/Carboplatin (TC Regimen) in Advanced Non Small Cell Lung Cancer (NSCLC)
clinical_study.official_title: Single-center, Open Trail of Phase 1 of M2ES With TC Regimen in Advanced NSCLC

lead_sponsor.agency: Tianjin Medical University Cancer Institute and Hospital

clinical_study.source: Tianjin Medical University Cancer Institute and Hospital

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to evaluate safety and tolerance of M2ES with TC regimen in advanced NSCLC.

primary_outcome.measure: Adverse events incidence,including severe adverse events incidence

secondary_outcome.measure: Tumor response rate and disease controlled rate

overall_official.affiliation: Tianjin Medical University Cancer Institude and Hospital

facility.name: Tianjin Medical University Cancer Institude and Hospital
